createTree(element, config)⚓

A factory function for Phylocanvas instances to enable decoration by plugins.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
element string | HTMLElement ID or element within which to place Phylocanvas instance.
config Object Configuration object, properties are copied into the Tree object.
Returns:
An instance of Tree.
